info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 2 at 4:30PM CDT until April 2 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lincoln IL
info.description:
TORILX
The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Central Macon County in central Illinois...
* Until 515 PM CDT.
* At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located over Niantic, or 10 miles west of Decatur, moving east at 50 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* These dangerous storms will be near... Forsyth, Warrensburg, Decatur, and Harristown around 435 PM CDT. Oreana around 440 PM CDT.
Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Argenta.
This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 126 and 156.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 5:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 5:15 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 5:15 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
